meta.title: TSC closure extended | TSC Posts

meta.name: description
meta.content: All schools will remain closed until at least May 1 to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus. The TSC will use remote learning opportunities for students during some of this time,
All schools will remain closed until at least May 1 to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus. The TSC will use remote learning opportunities for students during some of this time,

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout fsSection2532 fsHasTheme2 district

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsPost fsThumbnailAlignRight fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_5 fsSingleItem

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.p: The TSC will be extending the closure of schools until at least May 1. Governor Eric Holcomb announced today that all Indiana schools will remain closed until at least that time to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19).

The TSC plan previously announced is still in place; students are currently on spring break until remote learning begins Wednesday, April 1. Beginning Monday, April 6, we will utilize a weekly combination of remote learning days and instructional waiver days to get us through to May 1.The TSC remains committed to providing unique learning opportunities for our students during this time. Schools will provide more details on this topic once additional guidance from the Indiana Department of Education is published.
All school related activities, extracurricular events and practices remain postponed until further notice.
As we announced earlier, the TSC Nutrition Services Department will provide grab-and-go lunches starting Monday, March 23. Click here for details on the program.
Additional updates are posted on the TSC Health Services page.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window
